name: @plantinformatics/vcf-genotype-brapi
description: Client and server functions to access genotype data from VCF and Germinate via API endpoints via a custom web API and BrAPI

scripts.prepare: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n vcf-genotype-brapi -o dist/vcf-genotype-brapi.js -- main.js

author: AgriBio / Don Isdale
